traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesnâ€™t disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two attacks, using Slam or Rock Launch in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock Launch
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +8, range 60 ft. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
